mapper.update: update ujcms_survey set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title_ = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_date_ = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date_ = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mode_ = #{mode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, times_ = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, interval_ = #{interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled_ = #{enabled,jdbcType=CHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
